name: mandelbrot-and-julia
info:
# Mandelbrot and Julia sets

This simulation combines =[Mandelbrot set](/editor?sim=mandelbrot-enhanced)) and =[Julia set](/editor?sim=julia) examples.

By clicking a point on the Mandelbrot set image, user selects the value of parameter $c$ that determines the Julia set. The interior of the Julia set with the picked value of $c$ is then shown. Notice that a Julia set is connected if $c$ belongs to the Mandelbrot set. Otherwise, it's dust, and most likely the output window will contain no black pixels.
